phrs.translation: 菊花茶；菊花晶（茶菊花萃取物制品）
n. 野菊花，野菊花粉末

sentences.sentence: Wow! The blue chrysanthemums are breathtaking!
Clusters of white chrysanthemums are vying to break through the rank weeds.
sentences.translation: 白色的小野菊，一丛丛由草堆里钻出来。

sentences.sentence: It is also the traditional custom to wear cornel and admire chrysanthemums.
sentences.translation: 插茱萸和赏菊也是重阳节的传统习俗。
